reviews.customers_say: Customers love this sweater's cable knit design and find it well-made with a soft brushed acrylic fabric that isn't itchy. Customers find it very warm without being too bulky, and one mentions it's perfect for a cool fall day.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to color and worth the $$
items.body: I ordered this with hesitation. I was worried about the color. It runs small. Color is spot on. Heavy without the bulk. Looked great over a tee-shirt or a boho shirt. I’ve worn this over a tank top even. The length of this was exactly what I wanted. Very flattering. Well crafted and worth every cent. An excellent sweater when you need a little extra length that a regular sweater can’t give you. Material is soft. I have not washed this, to be fair, but I do not have any pilling or snags in it. Durable material. Great for layering. Over all I’m enjoying this. Read more
items.author: jennifer joy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely sweater
items.body: This has to be one of the softest, most comfortable, prettiest sweaters that I've worn in awhile. The length is perfect for me, I like them to go below my knees. I'm 5'4 approximately. The sleeve length is adequate, there's a tiny bit of room to move my arm about without it rising up and I have to tug at it,that irritates me. The color is so pretty, a soft light blue and it's so gorgeous, fell in love with this color thru the bag! The size is true, fit like I wanted,no buttons on this sweater but it falls naturally over the breast,the pockets are perfectly aligned, your hands go straight into them. The hood is nice, I like sweaters that are long with a hood depending on the style and this one fits pretty good. Doesn't fit like a hoodie hood would but it is fashionable, makes the sweater more attractive, it's the reason I bought it and I am100% so glad I did!! I highly recommend this sweater, if you prefer a sweater that is long to wear loosely then size up, especially if you put them in the dryer. I hang dry my long sweaters. I'm definitely going to get another color if I can find one that I like as much as this blue, it's really gorgeous! Thank you. Read more
items.author: kelli ivy

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cozy but leaves are a bit short and no buttons
items.body: I really like this cardigan overall — it’s soft, warm, and has that perfectly relaxed, cozy look. The knit feels thick and high-quality, and the length gives it a nice, wrapped-up style that works great with jeans or leggings. I’m 5’8” and 130 lbs, and the Medium fits well through the body — roomy but flattering. The only downside is that the sleeves are a little too short, hitting just above my wrists. It’s not a dealbreaker, but I wish they were an inch or two longer for that full cozy feel. There are no buttons or closures on the front, which is fine if you like an open style (I do), but just something to note. Overall, it’s still a really nice cardigan — warm, versatile, and easy to throw on. I’d definitely buy it again if the sleeves were a bit longer! Read more
items.author: WendyBG

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars No complaints
items.body: Not high end or anything surprisingly luxe, but not a single complaint either. It’s exactly what it appears to be and is comfy, cozy, and fits well. I think it’s overpriced but I haven’t found better for less here either so, I guess value is relative. Read more
items.author: Amanda Rumsey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and warm sweater
items.body: Perfect sweater! Thick and warm. Great value! Beautiful soft pink color. Read more
items.author: D. Kirchman

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So soft and comfy
items.body: This cardigan is very soft, warm and cozy. I liked it so much I got another one in a different color. I washed it on cold and dried it on low, and it came out beautifully. No shrinkage that I could detect. Read more
items.author: justme

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars A Cozy Hooded Sweater Adventure for the Big-Headed Ladies
items.body: I recently had the pleasure of trying out this women's hooded sweater, and boy, let me tell you about my hooded adventure! First things first, this sweater is incredibly soft and warm. It felt like a warm hug on a chilly day. But here's where the fun begins - the hood itself! Now, I must admit, I've always considered myself to have a gloriously large head (it's a gift, really). Unfortunately, the hood on this sweater seems to have a mind of its own, as it was slightly smaller than expected. Picture this: I'm ready to embrace the comforting warmth of a well-fitted hood, but instead, my head feels like it's on a quest to conquer Mount Everest within the confines of this tiny hood. It was quite the sight, I must say. Now, before you start picturing me with a superhero cape, let's dive into some important details. Despite the hood mishap, the overall design of the sweater is top-notch. The fabric is cozy ensuring you'll be rocking this sweater for seasons to come. Plus, the color options are a bonus, making it a versatile staple in any fashionista's wardrobe. But let's not stop there – I couldn't resist experimenting with some creative solutions for my head conundrum. From tucking my hair in an intricate bun to using strategic bobby pins to tame my rebellious locks, I turned this fashion puzzle into a humorous quest for the perfect fit. Who knew a humble hooded sweater could spark such creativity? In all seriousness, though, this sweater is a true gem, especially if you don't have a head that defies conventional proportions. So, if you're blessed with a head of more average dimensions than mine (and let's face it, most people are), this cozy gem might just be the perfect addition to your winter wardrobe. Remember, my fellow fashionistas, style isn't just about looking fabulous; it's also about adapting and finding humor in the quirks that come our way. So go ahead, embrace this sweater, have a laugh, and conquer the world – one hood at a time! Read more
items.author: H. Roque

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beauty and comfort
items.body: Very pretty! The material is soft and feels nice to wear. It does run small. But it fits nicely anyway Read more
items.author: Caroline Luther

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky Blue, Brown, Bluish Green, Blue, Dark Grey, Army Green, Black, Navy Blue, Orange, Dark Brown, Vermilion, Rose Red, Lake Blue, Wine Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
